youtube.title: How a Bunionectomy is Performed | 3D Medical Animation
youtube.description: Learn the step-by-step process of a bunionectomy in this detailed 3D biology animation. We explore how surgeons realign the bone to relieve pain and restore foot function. Perfect for students and curious minds! #medical #surgery #education
